title: Tyrus Net Worth 2025: How Much Money Does He Make?
description: Explore Tyrus' net worth in 2025 and his diverse career from wrestling to media. Discover his income sources now! The post Tyrus Net Worth 2025: How Much Money Does He Make? appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Vritti Johar
excerpt: Uncover Tyrus net worth in 2025, highlighting his diverse career from WWE to political commentary and podcasting success.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Tyrus’ net worth in 2025 showcases his evolution from wrestling star to influential media personality. From the WWE ring to political commentary and broadcasting, he’s carved out a diverse and impactful career. Here’s a look at how Tyrus built his fortune and continues to expand his reach beyond wrestling. What is Tyrus’ net worth in 2025? Tyrus has an estimated net worth of $2 million in 2025. Tyrus’ net worth in 2025 consists of earnings from his professional wrestling career, television appearances, acting roles, podcasting, and political commentary work. He is most famous for his time in WWE as Brodus Clay and in TNA Wrestling as Tyrus, as well as for being a political commentator and regular contributor on Fox News. He also hosts the podcast and Fox Nation show Maintaining with Tyrus. What does Tyrus do for a living? Tyrus is a media personality, political commentator, actor, author, and retired professional wrestler. Recently, Tyrus remains active in conservative media, regularly appearing on Fox News’ The Greg Gutfeld Show and hosting Maintaining with Tyrus on OutKick, which in 2024 featured an interview with Donald Trump. He has also been vocal about his health journey and continues to tour the speaking circuit. Tyrus’ earnings explained — how does he make money? Tyrus earns money through: His wrestling career – including contracts and appearances with WWE and TNA/Impact Wrestling Television and media work – as a Fox News contributor and host on Fox Nation/OutKick Podcasting and interviews – especially with Maintaining with Tyrus Acting roles – in both film and TV, including GLOW, MacGyver, and Supercon Public speaking and book sales – with topics ranging from politics to personal development Brand and sponsorship deals – often connected to his fitness journey and conservative media presence Looking ahead, Tyrus is continuing to expand his presence in political media, with more interviews and public commentary projects planned. He has hinted at a second book and may explore further television ventures or documentaries based on his life story and transformation.
html:
Tyrus’ net worth in 2025 showcases his evolution from wrestling star to influential media personality. From the WWE ring to political commentary and broadcasting, he’s carved out a diverse and impactful career.

Here’s a look at how Tyrus built his fortune and continues to expand his reach beyond wrestling.

What is Tyrus’ net worth in 2025?

Tyrus has an estimated net worth of $2 million in 2025.

Tyrus’ net worth in 2025 consists of earnings from his professional wrestling career, television appearances, acting roles, podcasting, and political commentary work.

He is most famous for his time in WWE as Brodus Clay and in TNA Wrestling as Tyrus, as well as for being a political commentator and regular contributor on Fox News. He also hosts the podcast and Fox Nation show Maintaining with Tyrus.

What does Tyrus do for a living?

Tyrus is a media personality, political commentator, actor, author, and retired professional wrestler.

Recently, Tyrus remains active in conservative media, regularly appearing on Fox News’ The Greg Gutfeld Show and hosting Maintaining with Tyrus on OutKick, which in 2024 featured an interview with Donald Trump. He has also been vocal about his health journey and continues to tour the speaking circuit.

Tyrus’ earnings explained — how does he make money?

Tyrus earns money through:

  • His wrestling career – including contracts and appearances with WWE and TNA/Impact Wrestling
  • Television and media work – as a Fox News contributor and host on Fox Nation/OutKick
  • Podcasting and interviews – especially with Maintaining with Tyrus
  • Acting roles – in both film and TV, including GLOW, MacGyver, and Supercon
  • Public speaking and book sales – with topics ranging from politics to personal development
  • Brand and sponsorship deals – often connected to his fitness journey and conservative media presence

Looking ahead, Tyrus is continuing to expand his presence in political media, with more interviews and public commentary projects planned. He has hinted at a second book and may explore further television ventures or documentaries based on his life story and transformation.
